DOC.brief_title: Study Responsiveness Seven Functional Tasks Patients With Poststroke Upper Limb Spasticity With Botulinum Toxin Type A Treatment
DOC.criteria: Medically stable poststroke focal unilateral upperlimb spasticity Stroke within 6 month study enrollment visit Previous current botulinum toxin therapy type study limb
